content: You will be redirected to the My Rooms automatically in 5 seconds.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that a user will be automatically redirected to their My Rooms page. It appears on a room access denied screen and can be translated to provide localized content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'My Rooms' is translated as 'ØºØ±ÙØªÙŠ' (my rooms), which implies possession. The intended meaning likely refers to a list or section named 'My Rooms', not literally the user's rooms. A more appropriate translation might be something like 'Ù‚Ø³Ù…ÙŠ' (my section/area) or a more general term for 'Rooms'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more general term for 'Rooms' or a term indicating a section or area, such as 'Ù‚Ø³Ù…ÙŠ' (my section) or a more suitable equivalent based on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation uses a somewhat formal tone. While grammatically correct, a slightly more conversational tone might be preferable for a user redirect message. Consider alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '5 saniyÉ™dÉ™n sonra OtaqlarÄ±m bÃ¶lmÉ™sinÉ™ yÃ¶nlÉ™ndirilÉ™cÉ™ksiniz' or 'OtaqlarÄ±m bÃ¶lmÉ™sinÉ™ 5 saniyÉ™dÉ™n sonra yÃ¶nlÉ™ndirilÉ™cÉ™ksiniz'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'My Rooms' is translated as 'Moje prostory'. While 'prostory' can mean rooms, 'Moje pokoje' would be a more accurate and natural translation of 'My Rooms' in this context, implying personal rooms or spaces.
While not strictly incorrect, the Czech translation could benefit from punctuation. Adding a period at the end improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Moje pokoje. Do 5 sekund budete automaticky pÅ™esmÄ›rovÃ¡ni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation 'a Le mie stanze' is grammatically incorrect. 'Le mie stanze' should be 'alle mie stanze' to correctly use the preposition 'a' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verrai reindirizzato automaticamente alle mie stanze in 5 secondi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses katakana for "My Rooms" (ã€Œç§ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ ã€). While technically correct, it deviates from typical Japanese UI conventions where romanized or hiragana/katakana versions of English terms are often preferred to provide a more natural feel. Consider using a more conventional term like ã€Œãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ ã€ or ã€Œãƒã‚¤ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€ for better user experience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ë¦¬ë””ë ‰ì…˜ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤' (rideurekseun ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤) is a direct transliteration of 'redirected' and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Korean. It sounds technical and somewhat awkward.
While technically correct, using a more common and fluent phrasing would improve the user experience. 'ì´ë™í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤' is more natural than the transliterated 'ë¦¬ë””ë ‰ì…˜ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤'.

The Lao translation 'àº«à»‰àº­àº‡àº‚àº­àº‡àº‚à»‰àº­àº' (hong khong khoy) translates to 'my room(s)' which might not be the intended meaning. Given the context ('You will be redirected to My Rooms'), a more appropriate translation would imply redirection to a list or section of rooms, not just a single room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that implies redirection to a room list or section, such as 'àº—à»ˆàº²àº™àºˆàº°àº–àº·àºàºªàº»à»ˆàº‡à»„àº›àº«àº²àºšàº±àº™àºŠàºµàº¥àº²àºàºŠàº·à»ˆàº«à»‰àº­àº‡àº‚àº­àº‡àº‚à»‰àº­àºà»‚àº”àºàº­àº±àº”àº•àº°à»‚àº™àº¡àº±àº”à»ƒàº™ 5 àº§àº´àº™àº²àº—àºµ.' (You will be redirected to the list of my rooms automatically in 5 seconds.) or something similar depending on the precise UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a slightly formal tone. While technically correct, it might be more user-friendly to use a more conversational tone, similar to the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Automatycznie zostaniesz przekierowany/a do sekcji Moje pokoje za 5 sekund.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'As Minhas Salas' is a literal translation of 'My Rooms'. A more natural and common Portuguese phrasing would be 'Meus Quartos'.
The term 'My Rooms' should be translated to 'Meus Quartos' instead of just 'Meus quartos'. 'Quartos' requires capitalization in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: VocÃª serÃ¡ redirecionado para Meus Quartos automaticamente em 5 segundos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'My Rooms' is translated as 'SÄƒlile mele'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation might be 'Camerele mele' or 'SecÅ£iunea Camerele mele'. The current translation sounds a bit formal.

ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the '5' with the appropriate Sinhala numeral representation (à¶´à·„).
